This blog was created as part of the class project for EDLD 654 in [Applied Machine Learning in Educational Data Science](https://uo-datasci-specialization.github.io/c4-ml-fall-2020/), taught by [Prof. Daniel Anderson](https://github.com/datalorax) and [Prof. Joseph Nese](https://education.uoregon.edu/people/faculty/jnese) at the University of Oregon. 

The authors of the blog are doctoral students at the University of Oregon:

[Asha Yadav](https://github.com/aashayadav), Special Education

[Alejandra](https://github.com/Alegarisa), Prevention Science

[Chris Ives](https://github.com/cives93), Special Education
